original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: Trump suggests a one-on-one meeting between Putin and Zelensky before a potential trilateral summit, with both leaders aiming to work towards a lasting peace without a ceasefire first. Putin is ready to meet Zelensky once all issues related to the conflict are worked out, according to Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov.</s>
